Name: Box Breathing
Description: Inhale 4s, hold 4s, exhale 4s, hold 4s. Repeat 4 times.

Name: 4-7-8 Breathing
Description: Inhale 4s, hold 7s, exhale 8s. Repeat slowly 3 times.

Name: Body Scan
Description: Close your eyes and scan your body from head to toe with closed eyes, noticing tension 🧍‍♂️

Name: 2-Minute Focus
Description: Focus on your breath 👃for 2 minutes. If your mind wanders, gently return.

Name: Stretch Break
Description: You are strong i know you will overcome every battle . Do this Stand and stretch your arms overhead. Hold for 5 seconds. Repeat 3x. You will feel better 🙂.

Name: Walk It Off
Description: Walk around for 5 minutes without your phone. Focus on your surroundings.See nature feel the calmness..greennery...wind..weather 🍃🌳

Name: 5-4-3-2-1 Grounding
Description: Name 5 things you see, 4 you can touch, 3 you hear, 2 you smell, 1 you taste.

Name: Feel Your Feet
Description: Place both feet on the ground. Feel the floor. Breathe slowly. Be Calm. I know your time will come. I believe in you 🙂

Name: You're doing your best
Description: You're doing your best. Take one step at a time 🙂

Name: You're doing your best
Description: Its okay to be stressed over something remember a very famous quote "If i can't run i will walk...If i can't walk i will crawl. Don't lose hope 🫂"

Name: You're doing your best
Description: You're doing your best. I know everything is hard its okay to feel sad or stressed but don't lose hope and try until end you have big dreams to achieve.🫂

Name: You're doing your best
Description: You're half way doing your best. I Believe in you. Universe believe in You.Your Family believes on you.You can do everything in Life. It will take time i know but you will get it there 🙂

Name: This too shall pass
Description: This too shall pass. You have overcome hard things before.🫂

Name: It's just a bad day not bad life. Next morning you will have a new day.Its your life you can write your story however you want. Don't worry much everything will be fine.
Description: This too shall pass. You have overcome hard things before.🫂

Name: Gratitude Note
Description: Write down two thing you're grateful for right now 🙂

Name: Feel Your Feet
Description: Drink water slowly. Listen to calming music. Breathe slowly. Be Calm. Sit for a while....Relax 🙂

Name: Label Your Emotion
Description: Say: 'I'm feeling [emotion]. It's okay to feel this way. I have got this i can achieve everything i dream of slowly and steadily i will get there 💪'
